mailForgotAccountMessage:
You have requested a re-establishment of your password, you can do this by following the link {{url}}, remember that this link is valid for 1 hour.

If you have not requested it, please ignore this email.
mailWelcomeUserMessage:
We're happy to welcome you at Venpad. To get you started, here's your account information.

Login url: {{urlLogin}}

Login username: {{username}}

Login password: {{password}}

To confirm your email address, please click on the following {{urlConfirmEmail}}.
homeDescription: Scaffolding ready to create an amazing project
formErrors: There are errors in the form, please review the comments marked with red color.
loginError: There was problem authenticating your acount via {{provider}}.
haveNotAccount: You have not created your account yet?
loginDescription: Login quickly with your email or social networks.
userAlreadyHasAccount: Do you already have an account? you can login {{loginUrl}}
registerDescription: Create an account easy and fast, with your email or social networks.
enterEmailFormat: The email does not have the correct format.
enterPasswordMin5Char: The password must be at least 5 characteres
enterPasswordNotMatch: The passwords written do not match.
contactDescription: You can contact us at anytime, through any of our chanels:
authNotLogin: You have to login to access this page
authNotPriviliges: You do not have enough privileges to access this page
comingSoonDescription: We are working to offer you a better service, we will be back soon.
docsDescription: Everything you need to know to get started with Venpad
faqDescription: Resolve any concerns you have about Venpad
priceDescription: Choose a plan and start billing
privacyDescription: Below we explaine how Venpad manages your registered data
termsDescription: Terms and conditions of use of Venpad service
forgotAccountDescription: We will send you an email with instructions to recover your account.
resetAccountDescription: Set a new password to recovery your account
mainError: We are sorry, something went wrong ({{error}})
catalogNameAlreadyExist: There is already a catalog with that name
localeNameAlreadyExist: There is already an locale with that name
planFeatureAlreadyExist: The feature already exist in the plan
userEmailAlreadyExist: There is already an account with that email
usernameAlreadyExist: There is already an account with that username
userNotHaveLocalPassport: User does not have local authentication strategy, please contact us for more information
userRecoveryAccountSuccess: An email has been sent with instructions for restoring your account
emailError: There was an error sending email
userResetError: No requests for account recovery were found
userResetPasswordEmpty: The new password can not be empty
userValidateEmailError: The email could not be confirmed, the user was not found
userValidateEmailSuccess: Thanks your email was succesfully confirmed
userResetSuccess: The password was updated succesfully, now you can access your account with your new password
planNameAlreadyExist: There is already a plan with that name
rolNameAlreadyExist: There is already a rol with that name
userPlanAlreadyExist: The plan is already associated with the user
sessionFinished: Your session was sucessfully finished, now you can leave the device safely
notFoundDescription: The link you followed was may broken, or the page may have been removed
thereIsNotData: There is no data to show at this moment
emailConfirmed: Congratulations you have already confirmed your email
emailUnconfirmed: You haven`t confirmed your email, please review your email and follor the instructions
userInactive: Yout account has been inactivated, please contact us for more information
securePaymentInfo: We protect your payment information with SSL (Secure Sockets Layer) when it is sent over the internet. SSL encrypts the payment information so it can not be intercepted by a third party. Venpad does not save your credit card information.
subscriptionWarnings:
I understand that my subscription will make automatic charges every month.

I understant that i can suspend my subscription whenever i want.
mailSubscriptionSuspendedMessage:
Your suscription has been canceled. You will have access at the resources allowed by your plan until {{expirationDate}}. We will not charge you more, until you decided return.

You can reactivate your subscription whenever you want. When you decide to return, we will be waiting for you happy.
mailSubscriptionCreatedMessage:
Your monthly subscription payment has been successful.

Thanks for being part of {{appName}}, Remember that this subscription makes automatic charges to your credit card. You can suspend the subscription whenever you want and view the history of your payments at any time from our web application.
subscriptionCreatedSuccess: The purchase was made successfully, now you can enter with your credentials and enjoy your services.
subscriptionCreatedError: We are sorry we could not execute the transaction at this time, please try later
subscriptionCreatedErrorCard: Your credit card has been rejected, please contact your bank for more information.
subscriptionDescription: Cancel, suspend or update your subscription plan
authStrategyFailed: We are sorry, no users were found with that authentication strategy.
planNotFound: We are sorry the plan was not found or is not available to buy.
mustAcceptTerms: You must agree to terms and conditions
subscriptionAlreadyExist: Sorry, you alredy have a subscription.
transactionApprovedDescription: The transaction has been approved successfully.
transactionExpiredDescription: We are sorry, the transaction has expired, you can try again when you want.
transactionDeclinedDescription: We are sorry, the transaction has been rejected, verify your data and try again.
transactionPendingDescription: The transaction is beign processed at this time, we will update the status of your payment when we have a response from it.
transactionErrorDescription: The transaction was unsuccessful, try again when you want.
updateCreditCardSuccessful: The credit card was updated successfuly.
noPaymentMethods: You don't have payment methods registered at the moment.
subscriptionNoCharges: No recurring charges will be made.
subscriptionNextPayment: The next payment will be made on {{date}}.
subscriptionNoPaymentMethods: To change your subscription, you need to create a credit card.
subscriptionChangePlan: The change of plan will be made on {{date}}.
subscriptionChangePlanImmediately: The change of plan will be made immediately.
subscriptionPlanFree: With this option you pause or suspend the payments of your subscription. You will have limited access to the services.
subsciptionPlanError: Sorry, the selected plan is not valid to create a subscription.
subscriptionClientError: There is no client associated with the subscription.
subscriptionCanceled: Your subscription has been canceled, we will stop charging your credit card.
subscriptionPlanError: The selected plan is not available for subscription payment.
subscriptionSchedule: Your subscription will be renewed at {{planName}} on {{date}}.
mailSubscriptionChangedMessage:
Yu have changed to {{planName}}, the subscription payment has been successful.

Thanks for being part of {{appName}}, Remember that this subscription makes automatic charges to your credit card. You can suspend the subscription whenever you want and view the history of your payments at any time from our web application.
transactionNotFound: It was not possible update the status of the transaction, the transaction was not found.
mailTransactionSuccessMessage: Congratulations!, the payment for {{itemDescription}} was processed correctly.
chatEmpty: You don't have new messages yet.
mailSubscriptionCanceledMessage: Your subscription has been canceled, we had problems debiting the payment on your credit card, verify the funds of your credit card or contact your bank for more information.
chatConversationsEmpty: You don't have conversations so far.
uploadPhoto: Here, drag your profile picture or upload a photo
